Title: Provides public access to epinephrine auto-injector devices at schools
Summary: Provides public access to epinephrine auto-injector devices at schools; establishes public access epinephrine auto-injector device providers.
LawCode: Amd ยง921-a, Ed L; amd ยง3000-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to providing public access to epinephrine auto-injector devices at schools
